actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend section 4311 of the Revised Statutes, relating to and prescribing the privileges of vessels of the United States.

summary.text: Prohibits foreign-flag vessels from landing their catches of fish or their fish products processed onboard in United States ports except where allowed pursuant to a treaty or convention to which the United States is a party and where such fish or fish products are brought into a foreign trade zone.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 4311 of the Revised Statutes, relating to and prescribing the privileges of vessels of the United States.
